summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2525, for the improvement of Genesee Street, from Rainier Avenue to 51st Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing the necessary bridges and culverts, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 29197 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
